name: Unnamed Dude v 1.2 "Music?"
description:
Unnamed Dude

Platformer in which you need to reach the end of the level!

Not the usual level, but created by you or other users!

Easily create levels!

Share them with your friends!
Update 1.2

- Brick with Spikes
- Falling Bricks
-Popup menu (game menu, not windows) - left click on "Change Music"

- Music Changer
- And bug fix.

P.S.
Sorry people, I don't know why antivirus swears on my game. :c

If anyone knows how to solve it, please contact with me
